name: MSPaint Blaster
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project: MSPaint Blaster!
Modifications:

1. Design Overhaul. Everything is MSPaint :)

2. Audio Overhaul. All audio has been improved with an all-original soundtrack!

3. New Levels. A whole two more levels were added with ramped-up difficulty!
